shortInfo: Schedule from over 1500 same-day, no-wait illness and injury visits every day. Our urgent care doctors meet rigorous clinical standards and have mastered our Perfect VisitÂ®. The Perfect Visit includes on-time visits, on-site prescription medications, lab tests, and common adult vaccinations at every clinic. Adults and kids welcome. Schedule online from your phone. We treat a range of illnesses and injuries including strep throat, bronchitis, broken bones, fevers, rashes, UTIs, sleep apnea, anxiety and depression, and ongoing diabetes treatment. We also handle prescription refills and STI testing on-site.
